definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: Why? Because people don't want another Thresher.
sentences.chinese: 为什么？由于人们不想要另一台脱粒机。

sentences.english: If she were rubbing the ends of the stalks, she would be guilty of threshing .
sentences.chinese: 如果她被搓完的秸秆，她将是有罪的脱粒。

sentences.english: When the wheat is headed it is reaped and threshed .
sentences.chinese: 麦子熟了，就把它收割脱粒了。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the manufacture of a new type of corn thresher.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型甜玉米脱粒机的研制。

sentences.english: Wet-shelled corn can be safely stored in air-tight storage units .
sentences.chinese: 脱粒的湿玉米可以安全地贮存在密闭的贮藏设备里。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a multifunctional thresher which belongs to an implement working on fields in agricultural machinery.
sentences.chinese: 多功能脱粒机属于农业机械中的场上作业机具。
因此你能买到玉米脱粒机。

sentences.english: They beat it out with flails, he and the woman together.
sentences.chinese: 他和她用连枷摔打水稻脱粒，摔打完后再扬场。

sentences.english: He threshes you to make you naked.
sentences.chinese: 他将你们脱粒，使你们赤裸。

sentences.english: It is not just grain itself: electricity and fuel for threshing and transport are also short.
sentences.chinese: 除了粮食本身，用于脱粒和运输的电力和石油也短缺。
于是穆那查到了脱粒机那里。

sentences.english: How design that height mass maize sheller is the priority designing that out.
sentences.chinese: 如何设计出高质量的玉米脱粒机是设计的重点。

sentences.english: At the end , The paper analyzed the primary factor of petiolate rate.
sentences.chinese: 最后，分析了脱粒带柄率的主要影响因素。

sentences.english: Now, volunteers are designing a pedal-powered grain crusher.
sentences.chinese: 现在，志愿者们在设计脚踏装置的稻谷脱粒机。

sentences.english: Before thrashing machines farmers thrashed their wheat by hand.
sentences.chinese: 在有脱粒机之前，农民用手打麦脱粒。

sentences.english: Before thrashing machines farmers thrashed their wheat by hand.
sentences.chinese: 在有脱粒机之前，农民用手打麦脱粒。

definition: to thresh or husk grain on a threshing ground (dialect)
to lay sth out to dry
to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
to roll with a stone roller/to thresh grain by rolling
